replies.msg:
利申：2017 DSE 而家讀緊HKU廢科
唔搵學生補習住

而家我會講下臨考果陣帶果本notes寫咗咩
sor for 1999
[Heat]
有expt係量一舊solid嘅specific heat capacity
滴油落去thermometer嘅contact位reason係good thermal contact

形容舊野傳熱點樣不外乎係
radiation: poor/good emitter/absorber of radiation
conduction: poor/good conductor/insulator

[Motion]
如果有graph係關於v^2/u^2
就要睇睇v^2-u^2=2as條式

stopping distance=thinking+braking distance

如果一個人企響地球赤度
佢嘅weight-reaction force=mass*v^2/radius(centripetal force)

[wave]
optical fibre advantage: carry more information
以前操ce卷寫faster好似係錯

higher voltage of transmission
∵not interfere by electric/magnetic field

longitudinal wave-->transverse wave
mechanical wave-->EM wave

n of violet>n of red-->in glass, violet deflects more than red

soft iron in generator
∵retain less magnetism

search coil-->measure varying B-field

less electrons-->higher electric potential

P=VI, P loss=I^2R efficiency=IV of a/IV of b

[radio]
cloud chamber--> alpha--> right-angled fork track

count rate∝(1/distance from source)^2

slow electron-->chain reaction

control rod-->absorb neutron-->control rate

water--> moderator-->stop fast neutron

Elective全部鳩背 唔寫了

睇番上面都覺得自己好on9 歡迎腐皮
各位有咩Physics問題想問都可以響度問架
數學問題都可以challenge下我

呢啲咁basic

last minute只會背番啲容易唔記得嘅concept
如果有難數都只會響屋企操多幾次
唔會拎過去試場睇

數學問題都可以challenge下我

Prove that no three positive integers a, b, and c satisfy the equation a^n + b^n = c^n for any integer value of n greater than 2.
